Then Samuel told them, “All you Israeli people must gather with me at Mizpah. Then I will pray to Yahweh for you.”
So they gathered at Mizpah, which was the town where Samuel previously was the leader of the Israeli people. They had a big ceremony there. They drew water
, and poured the water on the ground while Yahweh watched.
To show that they were sorry for having worshiped idols
, they did not eat any food on that day, and they confessed that they had sinned against Yahweh.
